trans-unit.source: Debug, Profile, and Diagnose | Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Debug, Profile, and Diagnose | Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Debug cross-language, locally, remotely, and in production. Simplified inspection of complex, multi-threaded code. Download for free to get started.
trans-unit.target: Debug cross-language, locally, remotely, and in production. Simplified inspection of complex, multi-threaded code. Download for free to get started.

trans-unit.source: Debug
trans-unit.target: Debug

trans-unit.source: Debug, Profile, and Diagnose code | Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Debug, Profile, and Diagnose code | Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Debug, Profile, and Diagnose
trans-unit.target: Debug, Profile, and Diagnose

trans-unit.source: Quickly find bugs in your code.
trans-unit.target: Quickly find bugs in your code.

trans-unit.source: Tab Down to Select a Version of Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Tab Down to Select a Version of Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Download Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Download Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Download Visual Studio Community 2017
trans-unit.target: Download Visual Studio Community 2017

trans-unit.source: Community 2017
trans-unit.target: Community 2017

trans-unit.source: Download Visual Studio Professional 2017
trans-unit.target: Download Visual Studio Professional 2017

trans-unit.source: Professional 2017
trans-unit.target: Professional 2017

trans-unit.source: Download Visual Studio Enterprise 2017
trans-unit.target: Download Visual Studio Enterprise 2017

trans-unit.source: Enterprise 2017
trans-unit.target: Enterprise 2017

trans-unit.source: https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/editing-your-code-1-562x309@2x-op.png
trans-unit.target: https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/editing-your-code-1-562x309@2x-op.png

trans-unit.source: Debug cross-language
trans-unit.target: Debug cross-language

trans-unit.source: Rich debugging for all your code
trans-unit.target: Rich debugging for all your code

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio provides an excellent debugging experience no matter what language you use – from C#/VB and C++, to JavaScript and Python, to XAML and HTML, all supported languages have debugging support.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio provides an excellent debugging experience no matter what language you use – from C#/VB and C++, to JavaScript and Python, to XAML and HTML, all supported languages have debugging support.

trans-unit.source: If your app mixes languages you can also interop-debug across the language boundary with mixed-mode debugging.
trans-unit.target: If your app mixes languages you can also interop-debug across the language boundary with mixed-mode debugging.

trans-unit.source: Any platform or place
trans-unit.target: Any platform or place

trans-unit.source: Locally, remotely, and in production
trans-unit.target: Locally, remotely, and in production

trans-unit.source: Anywhere your code runs, Visual Studio can debug it – from launching a local Windows app on the desktop or in the Android emulator, to attaching a remote Azure instance, iOS device, or gaming console; or to any web browser.
trans-unit.target: Anywhere your code runs, Visual Studio can debug it – from launching a local Windows app on the desktop or in the Android emulator, to attaching a remote Azure instance, iOS device, or gaming console; or to any web browser.

trans-unit.source: You can debug issues offline in your production environment using capabilities such as IntelliTrace and deep analysis of dump files.
trans-unit.target: You can debug issues offline in your production environment using capabilities such as IntelliTrace and deep analysis of dump files.

trans-unit.source: Fine-grained control
trans-unit.target: Fine-grained control

trans-unit.source: Decide exactly where and when you want to break and examine state
trans-unit.target: Decide exactly where and when you want to break and examine state

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio debugger lets you control execution, that is, decide exactly where you want to pause all the threads in the process, and inspect state at that point.
trans-unit.target: The Visual Studio debugger lets you control execution, that is, decide exactly where you want to pause all the threads in the process, and inspect state at that point.

trans-unit.source: You can Break All at any time, Step Over statements, Step Into and Out of functions, Run To Click, Edit and Continue, and everybody’s favorite, set Breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: You can Break All at any time, Step Over statements, Step Into and Out of functions, Run To Click, Edit and Continue, and everybody’s favorite, set Breakpoints.

trans-unit.source: Go ahead, take things to the next level and configure flexible conditions and actions for your breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: Go ahead, take things to the next level and configure flexible conditions and actions for your breakpoints.

trans-unit.source: Flexibly inspect state
trans-unit.target: Flexibly inspect state

trans-unit.source: See values of variables at runtime
trans-unit.target: See values of variables at runtime

trans-unit.source: Once you pause the application where you want it, Visual Studio offers many ways for you to inspect the value of your variables, to form or verify a hypothesis.
trans-unit.target: Once you pause the application where you want it, Visual Studio offers many ways for you to inspect the value of your variables, to form or verify a hypothesis.

trans-unit.source: Monitor a value while stepping through your code; glance at local variables, and evaluate complex expressions – all without leaving the debugger.
trans-unit.target: Monitor a value while stepping through your code; glance at local variables, and evaluate complex expressions – all without leaving the debugger.

trans-unit.source: You can even interactively query deep into a data structure.
trans-unit.target: You can even interactively query deep into a data structure.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions are good
trans-unit.target: Exceptions are good

trans-unit.source: Get alerted when things go wrong
trans-unit.target: Get alerted when things go wrong

trans-unit.source: Code defects and unexpected situations manifest themselves as exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Code defects and unexpected situations manifest themselves as exceptions.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions will crash your app or simply become hard bugs to track down.
trans-unit.target: Exceptions will crash your app or simply become hard bugs to track down.

trans-unit.source: While debugging with Visual Studio you can configure notifications when exceptions are thrown, and even choose specific exceptions of interest to focus on.
trans-unit.target: While debugging with Visual Studio you can configure notifications when exceptions are thrown, and even choose specific exceptions of interest to focus on.

trans-unit.source: You get alerted immediately with inner exception information and null reference analysis right from there, as easy as if you had hit a breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: You get alerted immediately with inner exception information and null reference analysis right from there, as easy as if you had hit a breakpoint.

trans-unit.source: Threading made easy
trans-unit.target: Threading made easy

trans-unit.source: Simplify control and inspection of complex multi-threaded code
trans-unit.target: Simplify control and inspection of complex multi-threaded code

trans-unit.source: Multi-threaded code is notoriously tough to debug.
trans-unit.target: Multi-threaded code is notoriously tough to debug.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio lets you control the execution of multiple threads at once and inspect state across many threads to make the big picture pop.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio lets you control the execution of multiple threads at once and inspect state across many threads to make the big picture pop.

trans-unit.source: See all the thread call stacks in a single graphical view and evaluate expressions across multiple threads to compare values.
trans-unit.target: See all the thread call stacks in a single graphical view and evaluate expressions across multiple threads to compare values.

trans-unit.source: Easily view information about threads and tasks, flag them, and freeze them.
trans-unit.target: Easily view information about threads and tasks, flag them, and freeze them.

trans-unit.source: Quickly switch between execution contexts, and use thread markers to see which lines of code your threads are executing at any moment.
trans-unit.target: Quickly switch between execution contexts, and use thread markers to see which lines of code your threads are executing at any moment.

trans-unit.source: Close to the metal…
trans-unit.target: Close to the metal…

trans-unit.source: Dig as deep as your code requires
trans-unit.target: Dig as deep as your code requires

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, especially for system- level C++ code, you need to drop closer to the hardware level to diagnose hard to find bugs.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes, especially for system- level C++ code, you need to drop closer to the hardware level to diagnose hard to find bugs.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio supports you to get this done with the Memory, Registers, and disassembly window.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio supports you to get this done with the Memory, Registers, and disassembly window.

trans-unit.source: Prevent perf issues
trans-unit.target: Prevent perf issues

trans-unit.source: Make your app fast and robust
trans-unit.target: Make your app fast and robust

trans-unit.source: Get information to help you make good performance choices as you code.
trans-unit.target: Get information to help you make good performance choices as you code.

trans-unit.source: Use in-editor PerfTips and diagnostics tools to understand the performance and memory characteristics of your code while you are debugging.
trans-unit.target: Use in-editor PerfTips and diagnostics tools to understand the performance and memory characteristics of your code while you are debugging.

trans-unit.source: Use comprehensive profiling tools without the debugger to get deeper insights into your app’s performance, including CPU, GPU, and memory usage, UI responsiveness, and network utilization.
trans-unit.target: Use comprehensive profiling tools without the debugger to get deeper insights into your app’s performance, including CPU, GPU, and memory usage, UI responsiveness, and network utilization.

trans-unit.source: No more “no repro”
trans-unit.target: No more “no repro”

trans-unit.source: Code execution history for .NET code
trans-unit.target: Code execution history for .NET code

trans-unit.source: As you edit and F5 to test your .NET code, you encounter an unexpected behavior, a bug.
trans-unit.target: As you edit and F5 to test your .NET code, you encounter an unexpected behavior, a bug.

trans-unit.source: Diagnosing that bug can sometimes take hours of searching through source code to find the relevant pieces of code and repeated guesses of where to set a breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: Diagnosing that bug can sometimes take hours of searching through source code to find the relevant pieces of code and repeated guesses of where to set a breakpoint.

trans-unit.source: With Visual Studio diagnostic tools and IntelliTrace you can see the history of your code’s execution and navigate back to inspect state without breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: With Visual Studio diagnostic tools and IntelliTrace you can see the history of your code’s execution and navigate back to inspect state without breakpoints.

trans-unit.source: Simple UI debugging
trans-unit.target: Simple UI debugging

trans-unit.source: XAML and HTML are code too
trans-unit.target: XAML and HTML are code too

trans-unit.source: You can get the app to look the way you want while it is running – no more relying on design time data to verify your layout.
trans-unit.target: You can get the app to look the way you want while it is running – no more relying on design time data to verify your layout.

trans-unit.source: For apps with an HTML or XAML user interface, identify issues in your UI layer by using code debugging features.
trans-unit.target: For apps with an HTML or XAML user interface, identify issues in your UI layer by using code debugging features.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio also allows you to explore the HTML DOM and visualize the structure of XAML code using the XAML Visual Tree while your app is running.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio also allows you to explore the HTML DOM and visualize the structure of XAML code using the XAML Visual Tree while your app is running.
